name: add_new_task
description: Adds Notion task. You MUST call this tool to record a task successfully.

description.description: Optional detailed description. Only use for complex tasks. Do NOT ask the user for this if not provided.

name: gather_routine_information
description: Gathers Lance's target daily routine information.

routine_type.description: The specific category of routine to retrieve.

day_of_week.description: The day of the week for which to gather information. Defaults to today.

name: get_pending_tasks
description: Lists non-Done tasks to find page_id. Do not call this tool unless strictly necessary.

name: mark_task_as_done
description: Sets task to Done. You MUST call this tool to mark a task as Done successfully.

name: shutdown_agent
description: Ends the conversation and shuts down the agent.

name: toggle_voice_mode
description: Toggles whether Junes responds with voice messages on Discord.

enabled.description: True to enable voice messages, False to use text.
